constant.comment: Maximum number of DCI information issued every TTI.
constant.name: MAX_NUMBER_OF_DCI

constant.comment: Maximum number PHICH groups in DL. In case of - normal cyclic prefix - max number of PHICH groups is 25 - extended cyclic prefix - max number of PHICH group is 50 (according to 3GPP 36.211 [6.9])
constant.name: MAX_NUMBER_OF_PHICH_GRP

constant.comment: Indicates how many DCI information structures can be included in a single report message.
constant.name: MAX_UL_DCI_PER_REPORT

constant.comment: Indicates how many DCI information structures can be included in a single report message.
constant.name: MAX_DL_DCI_PER_REPORT

constant.comment: Indicates the number of PDUs that the statistics can be reported in a single message (downlink)
constant.name: MAX_DL_PDU

constant.comment: Indicates the number of PDUs that the statistics can be reported in a single message (downlink)
constant.name: MAX_DL_PDU_MIMO

constant.comment: Indicates the number of PDUs that the statistics can be reported in a single message (uplink)
constant.name: MAX_UL_PDU

constant.comment: Indicates the maximum PDU size [number of bits]
constant.name: MAX_PDU_SIZE

constant.comment: Maximum number of UL Resource Block Groups.
constant.name: MAX_UL_RBG

constant.comment: Number of CQI values reported from UE
constant.name: NUMBER_OF_CQI_VALUES

constant.comment: Number of octets that carry PDU bits [number of bytes]
constant.name: MAX_PDU_DATA_LENGTH

constant.comment: Indicates how many transportBlocks are scheduled. This IE has always value of 2 in current version.
constant.name: NUMBER_OF_TRANSPORT_BLOCKS

constant.comment: Number of DCCH channels multiplexed on MAC PDU. Although the number of DCCH channels can vary there will be always 2 reports in the following group
constant.name: NUMBER_OF_DCCH

constant.comment: Number of statistics on DTCH channels multiplexed in PDU. Although the number of multiplexed DTCH channels can vary there will be always 8 reports in the following Group
constant.name: NUMBER_OF_DTCH

constant.comment: Number of CQI values reported from UE
constant.name: MAX_NUMBER_OF_S_CELLS

typedef.comment: Indicates the throughput in bits per second (bps). For DCM it is assumed that at most 76000 bits can be transmitted in one TTI.
typedef.name: TBitThroughput

typedef.comment: Resource allocation type according to 3GPP 25.213. The following encoding shall be used: Resource Allocation Type | Value ---------------------------------------- Type 0 | 0 Type 1 | 1 Type 2 with localized VRB | 2 Type 2 with distributed VRB | 3
typedef.name: TResAllocType

typedef.comment: Defines the modulation coding scheme MCS. The following encoding shall be used: MCS | Value ----------------- QPSK | 0 16QAM | 1 64QAM | 2
typedef.name: TMcsDct

typedef.comment: Relative power in dB units with 0.1 dB precision. The actual relative power value is obtained according to the following formula: Relative power value = value x 0.1 The gain is to encode the linear equivalent of the relative logarithmic power dynamic range between -30 dB and +60dB on the integer data type. The following conversion formula shall be used to encode the relative power: Value = P_linear * 10**3 where: Value - encoded power value transmitted over the interface P_linear - linear representation of the relative power
typedef.name: TRelativePower

typedef.comment: TPC power commands. TPC commands shall be encoded depending on channel type and DCI format as indicated in 3GPP TS 36.213 (v860) in the following tables: - 5.1.1.1-2 - 5.1.2.1-1 - 6.2-1 DCM uses only Accumulated
typedef.name: TTpcCmd

typedef.comment:
This type represents the HARQ evaluation received from UE in a single sub-frame. Because of MIMO operations in DL there may be up to 2 transport blocks (TB) per sub-frame. This type combines the result (Value) for doubled transport block. The value of TDlAckResult type is according to: Value = R_TB#0 + 4*R_TB#1 where R_TB = 0 if there is no transmission for TB, R_TB = 1 if NACK has been received for TB, R_TB = 2 if the ACK has been received for TB, R_TB = 3 if the DTX has been received for TB,
R_TB#0 : transport block 1 R_TB#1 : transport block 2
typedef.name: TDlAckResult

typedef.comment: Transmitted power Linear scale, unit = 10^-4 mW
typedef.name: TLinearTxPower

typedef.comment: Type for Received power or interference power Linear scale, unit = 10^-14 mW
typedef.name: TLinearRxPower

In case one of these symbols are not configured for signaling a value of 0 is used. In case all symbols are not configured for signaling in measurement period, output is invalid value "0xFFFF_FFFF".[DCT-PC converts the value to "-".] In case symbols are configured and measurement value is "0" , output value is "0". member.comment:
Hopping flag Latest value of UL Scheduling Grant which was transmitted shall be used in case the UL Scheduling Grant is not assigned for re-transmission. In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource,the value which should have been transmitted as UL Scheduling Grant shall be used.
In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) is not 0x91 or 0x01 or 0xCC, output is invalid value 0xFF
member.name: dctG3M4

member.comment:
Number of PRBs which PUSCH was mapped onto Latest value of UL Scheduling Grant which was transmitted shall be used in case the UL Scheduling Grant is not assigned for re-transmission. The first PRB number which PUSCH was mapped onto Latest value of UL Scheduling Grant which was transmitted shall be used in case the UL Scheduling Grant is not assigned for re-transmission. In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource,the value which should have been transmitted as UL Scheduling Grant shall be used. When PUSCH Hopping is supported, output value is before the Hopping value which should have been transmitted as UL Scheduling Grant shall be used.
In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) is not 0x91 or 0x01 or 0xCC, output is invalid value 0xFF

In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) is not 0x91 or 0x01 or 0xCC, output is invalid value 0xFF
member.name: dctG3M13

member.comment:
CQI request UE which scell is not configured. It should output as follows according to value of CSI request field (TS36.213.7.1)
UE in Pcell which scell is configured: [0] In case of "00" (No aperiodic CSI report triggered)
[1] In case of "01" (Aperiodic CSI report is triggered for the serving cell)
[2] In case of "10" (Aperiodic CSI report is triggered for a 1st set of serving cells configured by higher layers)
[3] In case of "11" (Aperiodic CSI report is triggered for a 2nd set of serving cells configured by higher layers) Invalid value (0xFF) shall be used in case the UL Scheduling Grant is not assigned for re-transmission. In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource,the value which should have been transmitted as UL Scheduling Grant shall be used.
In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) is not 0x91 or 0x01 or 0xCC, output is invalid value 0xFF
member.name: dctG3M14

member.comment:
TTI bundling information
0x00: TTI bundling OFF 0x91: TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 0, final TTI 0x01: TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 0 0xCC: TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 0, TTI skipped 0x11: TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 1, non final TTI 0x41: TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 1, final TTI 0x21:TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 2, non final TTI 0x51:TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 2, final TTI 0x31:TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 3. Final TTI, 4 tb received 0x61:TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 3. Final TTI, 3 tb received 0x71:TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 3. Final TTI, 2 tb received 0x81:TTI bundling ON, TTI bundling information = 3. Final TTI, 1 tb received In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, the following values shall be used depending on TTI bundling ON/OFF and measurement gap: 0x00
member.name: dctG3M41

member.comment:

In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource,the value which should have been transmitted as UL Scheduling Grant shall be used.

member.comment:
UPH
FSM should output G3M30 as the following formula. [UPH value received from UE][dB]+ [10log10(numberOfPrb)][dB]
[FSM shall report dB value, unit = 0.01 dB]
In case that received UL-SCH is Message 3, invalid value (0x80000000) shall be used. FSM should output invalid value (0x8000 0000) if UPH has not been received after Random Access Procedure In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated values shall be used.
In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) is not 0x91 or 0x01 or 0xCC, output is invalid value 0x80000000

member.comment:
Average Data Rate [bits per second] Average Data Rate of Logical Channel Group with the Highest Priority. In initial transmission case, it is decided in Buffer Status Check. In retransmission case, it should be Logical Channel Group which has Highest Priority in retransmission MAC-PDU. In case of RNTI is Temporary C-RNT, invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. It is specified by DCM's L1L2 specification (DCM know how)
In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated values shall be used.
member.name: dctG3M32

member.comment:
Mapping information of CCE which UL Scheduling Grant is mapped onto (# of CCE is 87 in case of 20MHz, defined by 36.213) in the case of non-adaptive retransmission caused by PHICH (NACK), invalid value (0x80) shall always be used. Minus value means as follows -1: dedicated preamble is used -2: contention preamble is used -3 : UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted
In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) is not 0x91 or 0x01 or 0xCC, output is invalid value 0x80
member.name: dctG3M33

member.comment:
PDCCH format for UL Scheduling Grant in the case of non-adaptive retransmission caused by PHICH (NACK), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In the case of msg3 by Rabdom Access Response is transmitted, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used
In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) is not 0x91 or 0x01 or 0xCC, output is invalid value 0xFF
member.name: dctG3M34

member.comment: #of retransmission of MAC PDU The first time transmission 0. Report value is the #of retransmission number of MAC PDU. In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated values shall be used. Invalid value is "0xFF "
member.name: dctG3M35

member.comment:
PHICH information Resource index which PHICH mapped onto 2NPhichSf x nPhichGroup + nPhichSeq When PHICH could not transmit by Measurement GAP,output resource index In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. FSM should output measured resource index even if PHICH can’t be transmitted because of measurement GAP
In the case of TTI bundling and TTI bundling information (dctG3M41) shows other than Final TTI, output is invalid value 0xFFFF FFFF
member.name: dctG3M36

member.comment:
Highest priority Logical Channel Group index
Invalid value 0xFF
member.name: dctG3M37

member.comment:
f(i) See TS36.213 chapter 5.1.2.1
Invalid value 0x7FFFFFFF
member.name: dctG3M38

member.comment:
Scheduling Coefficient
"Scheduling Coefficient" is output by internal value. When adjusting the unit to the L1L2ControlSpecification, use corrective calculation by the equation of below. C' = {5*Log2(C) + 5*Log2(10^7)} * 2^16 where C is output value from FSM
member.name: dctG3M39

dAvailable
defined in L1 L2 spec 3.4.1.9.2 (DCM know how)
member.name: dctG3M40

member.comment: Radio Network Temporary Identifier (dctG6M3) Identifies user. This RNTI can be one of the following (depending on scheduled channels and users): - C-RNTI - P-RNTI - SI-RNTI - RA-RNTI - temporary-CRNTI
member.name: rnti

member.comment:
Identifies user.
In case of temporary UeId, value 0xFFFFFFFF is outputted.
member.name: ueId

member.comment:
Resource block assignment as defined in 3GPP 36.212 [5.3.3.1] In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used.
Field of 28 bits without depending on the number of the bits of Resource block assignment, and it is seven columns by a hex digit. The bit string of Resource block assignment is at the right and the place without a bit is 0
member.name: dctG6M7

member.comment: Number of RBs which PDSCH was mapped onto In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M5

member.comment:
Resource allocation type Information to calculate assignment RB from Resource block assignment(TS36.212 5.3.3.1)
0: resource allocation type 0 1: resource allocation type 1 2: resource allocation type 2 (localized VRB) 3: resource allocation type 3 (distributed VRB)
In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M6

member.comment:
DCI Format type - Format 1: 0x10 (1) - Format 1A: 0x11 (2) - Format 1A (Sync request procedure): 0x14 (3) - Format 1C: 0x12 (4) - Format 2: 0x20 (5) - Format 2A: 0x21 (6)
In the parenthesis, it is printed value about the DCT-log. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M4

member.comment: HARQ swap flag In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1,1A,1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used In the case of DCI format = 2,2A, FSM outputs an invalid value (0xFF) in the case of disable the Transport block.
member.name: dctG6M8

member.comment: HARQ process number In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M9

member.comment: In the case of DCI format is Format1A(Sync request procedure), this field is 0. In the case of DCI format 2,2A, this field is fixed 2.
member.name: numberOfTranportBlocks

member.comment: Indicates how many transportBlocks are scheduled. This field is fixed size.
member.name: transportBlockInformationGroup

member.comment:
Average Data Rate [bits per second] Average Data Rate of Logical Channel with the Highest Priority.
In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated value shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M33

member.comment: Mapping information of CCE which DL Scheduling Information is mapped onto. CCE is specified in TS36.213 10.1 -In case that DL Scheduling Information was not transmit by PDCCH discard, output is -3. -In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, -3 value shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M34

member.comment: PDCCH format for DL Scheduling Grant according to 3GPP 36.211 [6.8.1] In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M35

member.comment: TPC command for PUCCH In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M20

member.comment: Precoding information Bit field mapped index which specified in TS36.212 5.3.3.1. In case of DCI format type is 1, 1A, 1A(Sync request procedure), 1C or 2A, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M21

member.comment: DL scheduling information "Rank" Number of Codeword In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type is 1, 1A, 1A(Sync request procedure) or 1C, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M37

member.comment: PUCCH information Resource index of PUCCH for ACK transmission which was specified in 36.213[10.1] In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M38

member.comment: DL scheduling information "Rank" Number of Codeword In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. In case of DCI format type is 1, 1A, 1A(Sync request procedure) or 1C, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M37

member.comment:
PUCCH information Resource index of PUCCH for ACK transmission which was specified in 36.213[10.1] For UE which SCell is not configured, In case of Pcell is set, output Candidate of resource index of PUCCH for ACK transmission by PUCCH format 1b with channel selection - 1 TB for Pcell and Scell: nPUCCH0
-2 TB for Pcell,1 TB for Scell: nPUCCH0
-1 TB for Pcell,2 TB for Scell: nPUCCH2
-2 TB for Pcell and Scell: nPUCCH0
In case of Scell is set, output Candidate of resource index of PUCCH for ACK transmission by PUCCH format 1b with channel selection -1 TB for Pcell and Scell: nPUCCH1
-2 TB for Pcell,1 TB for Scell: nPUCCH2 -1 TB for Pcell,2 TB for Scell: nPUCCH0
-2 TB for Pcell and Scell: nPUCCH2
In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M38

member.comment:
Resource index2 which PUCCH mapped onto
For UE which Scell is not set to, Resource index of PUCCH for ACK transmission In case of Pcell is set, output Candidate of resource index of PUCCH for ACK transmission by PUCCH format 1b with channel selection -1 TB for Pcell and Scell: invalid value 0xFFFFF -2 TB for Pcell,1 TB for Scell: npucch1 -1 TB for Pcell,2 TB for Scell: invalid value 0xFFFFF -2 TB for Pcell and Scell: npucch1
In case of Scell is set, output Candidate of resource index of PUCCH for ACK transmission by PUCCH format 1b with channel selection -1 TB for Pcell and Scell: invalid value 0xFFFFF -2 TB for Pcell,1 TB for Scell: invalid value 0xFFFFF -1 TB for Pcell,2 TB for Scell: npucch1 -2 TB for Pcell and Scell: npucch3
Refer to TS36.213, 10.1.2.2.1 for PUCCH format 1b with channel
member.name: dctG6M44

member.comment:
Highest priority Logical Channel index
defined in L1L2 spec 2.3.1.7.(DCM know how)
Output: 0 In case of no data 0 In case of CCH only 1 #1 DCCH SRB1(including case of MAC-CE Only) 2 #2 DCCH SRB2 3 #3 DTCH DRB#1 4 #4 DTCH DRB#2 ...
member.name: dctG6M40

member.comment:
g(i)
see TS36.213 chapter 5.1.2.1
member.name: dctG6M41

member.comment:
Scheduling Coefficient
"Scheduling Coefficient" is output by internal value. When adjusting the unit to the L1L2ControlSpecification, use corrective calculation by the equation of below. C' = {5*Log2(C) + 5*Log2(10^7)} * 2^16 where C is output value from FSM
member.name: dctG6M42

member.comment:
dAvailable
defined in L1L2 spec 2.3.1.7.2(DCM know how)
member.name: dctG6M43

member.comment: PCell / SCell information [0]: non CA [1]: PCell [2]: SCell
member.name: dctG6M45

member.comment:
Transport Block Number 0 : transport block 1, 1 : transport block 2
-In case of DCI format is Format 1A (Sync request procedure), transportBlockNumber #0 and transportBlockNumber #1 outputs invalid value 0xFF. -In case of DCI format is Format 1 and Format 1A and Format 1C, transportBlock #0 outputs valid value and transportBlock #1 outputs invalid value 0xFF. -In case of DCI format is Format 2/2A, transportBlock #0 and transportBlock #1 outputs valid value.
member.name: transportBlockNumber

member.comment:
(dctG6M15) Modulation scheme *1 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=0 *2 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=1 *3 is applied to both transportBlockNumber=0 and transportBlockNumber=1
*1: In case of DCI format type is 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. *2: In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. *3: In case of DCI format 2/2A and Transport Block disable, Invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M10

member.comment:
(dctG6M16) MCS Index (Imcs) (defined in 3GPP TS 36.213, chapter 7.1.7.1) *1 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=0 *2 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=1 *3 is applied to both transportBlockNumber=0 and transportBlockNumber=1
*1: In case of DCI format type is 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. *2: In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M11

member.comment:
(dctG6M18) New data indicator *1 and *2 are applied to only transportBlockNumber=0 *3 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=1 *4 is applied to both transportBlockNumber=0 and transportBlockNumber=1
*1: In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. *2: In case of DCI format type is 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. *4: In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. *5: In case of DCI format 2/2A and Transport Block disable, Invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M13

member.comment:
(dctG6M12) Transport Block Size (TBS)
*1 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=0 *2 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=1 *3 and *4 are applied to both transportBlockNumber=0 and transportBlockNumber=1 *1: In case of DCI format type is 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. *2: In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used. *3: In case that DCI format type is 2 or 2A and transport block disable, output value = 0 shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M12

member.comment:
(dctG6M19) Redundancy version *1 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=0 *2 is applied to only transportBlockNumber=1 *3 is applied to both transportBlockNumber=0 and transportBlockNumber=1 *1: In case of DCI format type is 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. *2: In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, value which should have been transmitted as DL Scheduling Information shall be used.
In case of RNTI=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI, RA-RNTI and CCE resource is shortage (PDCCH discard), Invalid value shall be used
member.name: dctG6M14

member.comment: Number of retransmission of MAC PDU 0:the first transmission FSM reports #of retransmission. In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated value shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFF) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M36

member.comment: CQI FSM does actual value *1000 and output it In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0x80000000) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated value shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0x80000000) shall be used. In case of Msg4 or retransmission, Invalid value (0x80000000) shall be used.
member.name: dctG6M30

member.comment: Offset Value in CQI offset adjustment In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0x80000000) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated value shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0x80000000) shall be used. FSM does actual value *1000 and output it
member.name: dctG6M31

member.comment: Received CQI (Wideband) In the case CRC NG,output value is defined in L1L2 spec 2.4.4.1.1(DCM know how). In case of rnti=P-RNTI, SI-RNTI or RA-RNTI, invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. In case that DL Scheduling Information is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated value shall be used. In case of DCI format type = 1A(Sync request procedure), invalid value (0xFFFFFFFF) shall be used. In case the CQI reception is not good due to the reliability judgment or CRC check failure, output latest Wideband CQI
member.name: dctG6M32

member.comment: Random Access Preamble ID In the case of RNTI is P-RNTI, SI-RNTI, RA-RNTI invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. In the case of FormatType is not 1A(Sync request).invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated values shall be used.
member.name: preambleIndex

member.comment: PRACH Mask Index In the case of RNTI is P-RNTI, SI-RNTI, RA-RNTI invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. In the case of FormatType is not 1A(Sync request).invalid value (0xFFFF FFFF) shall be used. In the case of UL Scheduling Grant is not transmitted due to lack of PDCCH resource, calculated values shall be used.
member.name: prachmaskIndex

struct.comment: Notes and issues: 1) IE “dctG9M3” (Loss Rate of AMD PDU) shall be set to 0xFFFFFFFF if no ACK and no NACK has been received in the reporting period (# ACKed AM PDU + # NACKed AM PDU is 0). 2) Measurements dctG9M1 and dctG9M2 does not include the Control PDU throughput, that is bits of STATUS PDU are not accounted.

member.comment: The SFN which the DCT measurement is started on. SFN shall be set so that it is at least 2 SFNs ahead, but not more than 1000 SFNs ahead of the current SFN. In case the startSfn contains value 0xFFFFFFFF the measurement shall be started immediately
